named-query.name: findPropertyDefinition
named-query.query: SELECT pd FROM PropertyDefinition pd WHERE pd.typeId = :typeId ORDER BY pd.name

named-query.name: findAccessControl
named-query.query: SELECT ac FROM AccessControl ac WHERE ac.typeId = :typeId ORDER BY ac.roleId, ac.action

named-query.name: removePropertyDefinition
named-query.query: DELETE FROM PropertyDefinition pd WHERE pd.typeId = :typeId

named-query.name: removeAccessControl
named-query.query: DELETE FROM AccessControl ac WHERE ac.typeId = :typeId

named-query.name: isDerivedType
named-query.query: SELECT count(t) FROM Type t WHERE t.superTypeId = :typeId AND (t.removed IS NULL OR UPPER(t.removed) = 'F')

named-query.name: countTypes
named-query.query: SELECT count(t) FROM Type t WHERE (t.typeId LIKE :typeId ESCAPE '\' OR :typeId IS NULL) AND (t.superTypeId = :superTypeId OR :superTypeId IS NULL OR (:superTypeId = '-' AND t.superTypeId IS NULL)) AND (UPPER(t.description) LIKE :description OR :description IS NULL) AND (t.changeDateTime >= :minChangeDateTime OR :minChangeDateTime IS NULL) AND (t.changeDateTime <= :maxChangeDateTime OR :maxChangeDateTime IS NULL) AND (t.removed IS NULL OR UPPER(t.removed) = 'F') AND (:typePath IS NULL OR t.typePath LIKE :typePath) AND (:action IS NULL OR EXISTS (SELECT acl.typeId from AccessControl acl WHERE acl.typeId = t.typeId AND acl.action = :action AND LOCATE(CONCAT(',', CONCAT(acl.roleId, ',')), :userRoles) > 0))

named-query.name: findTypes
named-query.query: SELECT t FROM Type t WHERE (t.typeId LIKE :typeId ESCAPE '\' OR :typeId IS NULL) AND (t.superTypeId = :superTypeId OR :superTypeId IS NULL OR (:superTypeId = '-' AND t.superTypeId IS NULL)) AND (UPPER(t.description) LIKE :description OR :description IS NULL) AND (t.changeDateTime >= :minChangeDateTime OR :minChangeDateTime IS NULL) AND (t.changeDateTime < :maxChangeDateTime OR :maxChangeDateTime IS NULL) AND (t.removed IS NULL OR UPPER(t.removed) = 'F') AND (:typePath IS NULL OR t.typePath LIKE :typePath) AND (:action IS NULL OR EXISTS (SELECT acl.typeId from AccessControl acl WHERE acl.typeId = t.typeId AND acl.action = :action AND LOCATE(CONCAT(',', CONCAT(acl.roleId, ',')), :userRoles) > 0)) ORDER BY t.description

named-query.name: listModifiedTypes
named-query.query: SELECT t.typeId FROM Type t WHERE t.changeDateTime >= :dateTime1 AND t.changeDateTime < :dateTime2

named-query.name: changeTypePaths
named-query.query: UPDATE Type t SET t.typePath = concat(:newTypePath, substring(t.typePath, length(:oldTypePath) + 1, length(t.typePath) - length(:oldTypePath))) WHERE t.typePath LIKE :oldTypePathPattern ESCAPE '\'

named-query.name: isDerivedEnumType
named-query.query: SELECT count(et) FROM EnumType et WHERE et.superEnumTypeId = :enumTypeId

named-query.name: countEnumTypes
named-query.query: SELECT COUNT(et) FROM EnumType et WHERE (UPPER(et.name) LIKE :name OR :name IS NULL) AND (et.superEnumTypeId = :superEnumTypeId OR :superEnumTypeId IS NULL) AND ((LOCATE(CONCAT(',', CONCAT(et.enumTypeId, ',')), :enumTypeId) > 0) OR :enumTypeId IS NULL)

named-query.name: findEnumTypes
named-query.query: SELECT et FROM EnumType et WHERE (UPPER(et.name) LIKE :name OR :name IS NULL) AND (et.superEnumTypeId = :superEnumTypeId OR :superEnumTypeId IS NULL) AND ((LOCATE(CONCAT(',', CONCAT(et.enumTypeId, ',')), :enumTypeId) > 0) OR :enumTypeId IS NULL) ORDER BY et.enumTypeId

named-query.name: countEnumTypeItems
named-query.query: SELECT COUNT(i) FROM EnumTypeItem i WHERE (i.enumTypeId = :enumTypeId OR :enumTypeId IS NULL) AND (UPPER(i.label) LIKE :label OR :label IS NULL) AND (UPPER(i.description) LIKE :description OR :description IS NULL) AND (i.value = :value OR :value IS NULL)

named-query.name: findEnumTypeItems
named-query.query: SELECT i FROM EnumTypeItem i WHERE (i.enumTypeId = :enumTypeId OR :enumTypeId IS NULL) AND (UPPER(i.label) LIKE :label OR :label IS NULL) AND (UPPER(i.description) LIKE :description OR :description IS NULL) AND (i.value = :value OR :value IS NULL) ORDER BY i.enumTypeId,i.index

named-query.name: removeEnumTypeItems
named-query.query: DELETE FROM EnumTypeItem i WHERE i.enumTypeId = :enumTypeId

named-query.name: getMaxIndexInEnumType
named-query.query: SELECT MAX(i.index) FROM EnumTypeItem i WHERE i.enumTypeId = :enumTypeId

named-query.name: shiftIndexesInEnumType
named-query.query: UPDATE EnumTypeItem i SET i.index = i.index + :increment WHERE i.enumTypeId = :enumTypeId AND (i.index >= :minIndex OR :minIndex IS NULL) AND (i.index <= :maxIndex OR :maxIndex IS NULL)
